entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 1 April 2023
